highlights.description: Add namespace support for organizing agents into subdirectories

added.description: Optional `namespace` field in agent schema for organizing agents
Recursive directory scanning in `LoadAgentsFromDir` - agents in subdirectories get namespace from directory name
`Namespace` field on Agent struct in Go SDK
`AllowedTools` field on Agent struct in Go SDK
`QualifiedName()` method on Agent to get `namespace/name` format
YAML struct tags on all Agent fields
Support for `namespace/agent-name` references in team schema (agents, orchestrator, step.agent)

documentation.description: README section on nested agent directories with examples

added.description: Tasks to agent schema with `id`, `description`, `type`, `command`, `pattern`, `file`, `required`, `expected_output`, `human_in_loop` fields
DAG-aware topological sorting for team reports
Team status report IR and renderer (NASA-style Go/No-Go validation)

changed.description: Rename `checks` to `tasks` in report schema for consistency

documentation.description: Installation section with Go SDK tagging notes

highlights.description: Initial release with platform-agnostic agent definitions and multi-language SDKs

added.description: JSON schemas for agent, team, and deployment definitions
Go SDK with model/tool mappings for Claude Code, Kiro CLI, AWS Bedrock, and AgentKit

documentation.description: README with architecture overview, schemas, and usage examples

infrastructure.description: GitHub Actions CI workflow for Go SDK testing
GitHub Actions lint workflow with golangci-lint

fixed.description: CI workflows working-directory set to sdk/go
